xrpl_protocol_summary.description: XRPL protocol reference covers ledger data types, transaction types, and binary formats. Key concepts: accounts, transactions, ledgers, consensus, tokens (fungible/NFT), DEX, AMMs, sidechains.

key_sections.consensus: Ripple Protocol Consensus Algorithm (RPCA) for validation.
key_sections.tokens: Fungible (IOUs), NFTs (XLS-20), DEX with offers and AMMs.

xrpl_protocol_summary.usage: Reference for building compliant XRPL applications, understanding ledger state, and implementing features.
